Meeting.text: You know you can't run from what you've done, Bo.
Your crime will follow you like a shadow.
These islands are full of danger.
You won't last long with that dull knife.
Wait, you do know how to use a knife right?
WHAT !?! YOU DON'T KNOW HOW TO USE A KNIFE ??!

Attacking is probably the SIMPLEST thing one could do:
just press <SPACE or C or X or Z> then quickly press the directional prompts.
Don't think I'm helping you for your sake either..
Seeing you die right away just wouldn't be as entertaining. heh heh
